bow: someone needs to see this today and screw susie anyway preach lol used to work full time but now stay home when was working never wanted to go out without my daughter because missed her so much now that home savor run to the store alone love her more than life but need break bet work but still want some time to myself to be something other than manager or mom there is ton of time just for me so jump at it when can get it amen have friend with daughter the same age as mine they re three she has never spent the night away from her child my kid on the other hand spends usually at least one night of the weekend at either my parent house or my in laws house every weekend it more rare for her to be home the entire weekend than to be gone it great for my mental health and our marriage my 10 min trip to the drug store was amazing and my girl is only 17 days old mamma needs some minutes to stay sane still battling post partum depression and love my son dearly but being away and not having to worry about him for few hours really helped my stress levels in those first few months work with woman her and her husband went away for weekend when their oldest was seventeen and it was the first time she had been without her kids need date night and time with my husband without her and moms should be able to do that without justifying how much we love our kids had really awful ppd and used to feel so guilty that loved time without her so much once accepted that it was okay to have time for myself and being mom does mean you lose everything else about yourself became much happier person and better mom woah that is wild stories like that make me think missing some fundamental mom gene or something also feel that way when see posts on social media or whatever about being mom like the ones where it seems ops entire identity is being parent just ca quite fathom that and sometimes it makes me feel broken in some way think it important for kids to see that mom is not just mom to be whole person that does just revolve around them better mom because take care of my needs too my parents came to visit when our daughter was just under two weeks old and the first thing my mom and did was costco run without the baby had much needed hotdog and soft serve got some shopping done and my husband and dad got to spend quality time with the baby without me hovering my boobs cried but didn not that judging crying that ok too fully agree once was cleared to workout left my son at weeks old with my husband for at least 90 minutes days week to go to the gym much needed sometimes rode my horse after too ve come across many mothers like this in my short time being mom we have 15m old and for the past month we ve been getting sitter every saturday or sunday for 8hrs my and go to lunch spend time together play games do fun activities while our son is safe at home with the sitter this has done amazing things for our relationship we re able to focus on each other and be the parents our son deserves sometimes you got ta get away for couple of hours and it totally okay we ve spoken to other parents about our new routine and they almost always say oh your so lucky you guys can do that or must be nice or couldn do that to my kids sitting here sick with sick toddler who is refusing to nap so we are watching disney movie so can get few minutes to tape my sanity back together do what you have to do for you even if it means few minutes of extra screen time and box of teddy grahams being mom is marathon not sprint go at your own pace think we all have those days where we feel like super mom and then we have days where the tv becomes the babysitter do what you got ta do one of my friends just said that she is staying overnight at our friend wedding hours away because she ca be away
